name: TreeView
details:
[TreeView](https://jdanque.github.io/p/treeview/) displays Trello lists and cards in a tree view for easier visualization.

Users can:

* See total cards in a list.
* Collapse lists,cards and board without archiving
* Remove viewing of labels and badges
* Drag and drop lists and cards
* Customize theme
* Sync with your trello board upon drag and drop
* Update tree upon recieving updates from Trello

 *Needs Authorization to enable card drag and drop*
